panels.description:
Calculates rate at which CPU throttling periods occur for each namespace over last 1 minute.

CPU throttling happens when containers exceed their allocated quota.

Example: rate of 0.05, means throttling occurring 0.05 periods per second - or once every 20 seconds (on average).
panels.title: CPU Throttled Periods (Namespace)
